caption:
This photograph captures a rustic scene of rural life, featuring a person on horseback herding cattle in a grassy field. The individual, who appears to be a middle-aged man, is dressed in traditional ranch attire: a cowboy hat, long-sleeve shirt, and riding chaps. He is mounted on a brown horse and is actively watching over the herd.

The herd consists of around a dozen cattle, including cows and their calves. The cattle have predominantly reddish-brown and white coats. They are dotted throughout the foreground of the image, grazing calmly on the lush green pasture.

The setting is a vast, open field bordered by a simple fence that disappears into a background of gently rolling hills. The sky above is clear and bright, suggesting it is midday or early afternoon.

This image powerfully conveys a moment of daily life in the countryside, emphasizing the relationship between a rancher, his animals, and the natural landscape.
title: At the Oldlands' summer cow camp, 15 miles south of their Piceance Creek ranch. Three generations of Oldlands have ranched here.
